title: Loxodon
entryLore: Loxodon are elephant-like humanoids native to the plane of Ravnica, where they are known for their calm demeanor, strong sense of community, and unwavering loyalty. They are patient, methodical creatures who value tradition and the bonds of family and guild above all else. Loxodon possess an incredible memory, often recalling events from decades past with perfect clarity. Their powerful trunks serve as versatile appendages capable of delicate manipulation, and their thick skin provides natural protection. Most loxodon are drawn to callings that allow them to serve their communities, such as clerics, druids, or fighters.

lore.typicalDwelling: Loxodon live in spacious, well-constructed dwellings that reflect their calm nature and strong sense of community. Their homes often feature open-air courtyards, large central areas for communal gatherings, and sturdy stone architecture that conveys a sense of permanence and tradition. They value stability and order, their living spaces often meticulously organized and filled with objects that have deep personal or familial significance. In larger settlements, they gravitate toward the grand guild-halls of the Selesnya Conclave or the Azorius Senate.
lore.typicalAttire: Loxodon fashion is governed by elegance, comfort, and the expression of their communal bonds. They favor flowing garments in high-quality fabrics like silk and fine wool in harmonious shades of cream, sky blue, and forest green. Their attire is designed to accommodate their large frames and powerful limbs, often featuring elaborate drapes, sashes, and sashes that denote their guild or family lineage. Many wear jewelry that incorporates polished ivory, gold filigree, and intricate engravings that serve as a record of their personal history.
lore.typicalEnvironment: Grand guild-halls, peaceful coastal retreats, and the high-altitude monasteries of the Selesnya Conclave are the loxodon's preferred habitats. They thrive in environments that offer a degree of peace and the opportunity for communal celebration. Many serve as specialized clerics, wise counselors, architects of monumental structures, or resilient guardians. They are comfortable in a variety of terrestrial climates, provided they have a strong sense of community and the freedom to practice their ancient traditions.
lore.societyType: Loxodon society is communal and organized around shared tradition and the wellbeing of the group or guild. They value patience, loyalty, and the preservation of order above material wealth or personal power. Leadership is usually held by the most experienced or wise members of the community. Their culture is one of collective resilience and the belief that the truest measure of a person is their ability to contribute to the strength and harmony of their kin.
lore.typicalAssociation: Loxodon tend toward lawful good or lawful neutral alignments, driven by a deep sense of duty and a commitment to protecting the social order. They are an honest and empathetic people, often possessing a profound understanding of the suffering and hopes of others. While they are usually peaceful and avoid conflict, they are resolute in their defense of their friends and their way of life. They value stability and the clarity that comes from a life lived in accordance with tradition.
lore.physicalAppearance: Loxodon are imposing elephant-headed humanoids standing 7 to 8 feet tall and weighing over 400 pounds of solid muscle. Their most striking feature is their massive elephant head, which possesses a broad muzzle, large sensitive ears, and a powerful, tactile trunk capable of delicate manipulation. Their skin is thick and leathery, ranging in color from charcoal gray and pebble brown to a dusky slate. Their eyes are small but bright and expressive, often reflecting a focused and patient nature. Their hands and feet are large and powerful, with thick digits capable of handling heavy equipment or performing delicate ritual tasks. They move with a measured, purposeful gait that conveys both immense physical power and a lifetime of calm discipline. Their presence is tranquil and anchors the space around them, a visible manifestation of their strength and enduring patience.

traits.name: Loxodon Serenity
traits.description: You have [[advantage]] on saving throws against being [[charmed]] or [[frightened]].

traits.name: Natural Armor
traits.description: You have thick, leathery skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 12 + your Constitution modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

traits.name: Trunk
traits.description: You can grasp things with your trunk, and you can use it as a snorkel. It has a reach of 5 feet, and it can lift a number of pounds equal to five times your Strength score. You can use it to do the following simple tasks: lift, drop, hold, push, or pull an object or a creature; open or close a door or a container; grapple someone; or make an unarmed strike. The game might allow other simple tasks to be added to that list of options. Your trunk can't wield weapons or shields or do anything that requires manual precision, such as using tools or magic items or performing the somatic components of a spell.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: Thanks to your sensitive trunk, you have [[advantage]] on Wisdom ([[perception|Perception]]), Wisdom ([[survival|Survival]]), and Intelligence ([[investigation|Investigation]]) checks that involve smell.
